title: New & Video: AlunaGeorge – Diver (Teaser)
body:
**Alunageorge** have had one hell of a year and it looks like 2013 is going to be even bigger.

The experimental RnB duo have dropped the first snippet from their debut LP, due out on [Island Def Jam](http://www.islanddefjam.com/default.aspx?labelID=62) this coming June, laying the foundations of what’s expected of them next year. The video was made by our friends over at **Feel Good Lost** and it’s as beautiful as always.
